name: Bouncy Dino Hop - The Best of Dinosaur Games with Only One Life
name_original: Bouncy Dino Hop - The Best of Dinosaur Games with Only One Life
description:
Hop around with the Bouncy Dino in this super fun and addicting prehistoric adventure game.

Tap the screen to make the dino bounce side to side, all while dodging the deadly leaf spikes!

Features
- High quality graphics
- Super fun
- Easy to pick up
- Challenging
- Highly addictive
- Endless game play
- Hours of bouncing excitement
- Game center

** Search "Tardent" on the App Store for more great apps.
